subject: Re: tearDown not getting called if testXXX throws exception
msgSnippet: ... not cleanup) if one of my tests ... Peter, That s exactly the way the code is written. I ve provided a patch,
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., "Peter McEvoy" <pmcevoy@i...> wrote:
> I have noticed that tearDown() is NOT getting called (and hence does
not cleanup) if one of my tests
> throws an exception.
>
> Is this expected behaviour?
>
> C Ya,
>
> Peter McEvoy

Peter,

That's exactly the way the code is written.

I've provided a patch,
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=436182&group_id=15278&atid=315278
.

Please try it and let me know if it does what you need.

Thanks,

Dave
